remoteCommText.cn: 管理员！突发情况！
remoteCommText.en: Endmin! We got a situation!

remoteCommText.cn: 你记得我们有一个净水设备的项目吗？
remoteCommText.en: Remember our water purifier project?

remoteCommText.cn: 安德烈先生，你之前提起过这事。
remoteCommText.en: Mr. Andre, you've already mentioned this before.

remoteCommText.cn: 哈哈，急得我有点找不着北了，都给忘了。
remoteCommText.en: Hoho ... Yeah ... guess I was getting a little too desperate and I forgot all about it.

remoteCommText.cn: 哦，佩丽卡监督刚刚回消息了，她查了资产注册表，应该在超域试验场外的区域……
remoteCommText.en: Anyway, Supervisor Perlica just replied. She reviewed our asset register. It should be somewhere right outside the Æther Test Site...

remoteCommText.cn: 奇怪，怎么会注册在那里？
remoteCommText.en: Honestly, the place where it's registered seems ... rather odd.

remoteCommText.cn: 供能高地的工人们应该都撤离到工人之家了，能辛苦你们去问问看吗？
remoteCommText.en: The crew mates of the Power Plateau should have retreated to the Worker Dorms already. Can I ask you to check the Worker Dorms and figure out what happened?

remoteCommText.cn: 我们就在工人之家！好巧，那我们现在就去四周打听一下。
remoteCommText.en: What a coincidence! We're right in the Worker Dorms! We'll ask around right away.

remoteCommText.cn: 太好了！我需要的是那台净水设备的过滤装置。
remoteCommText.en: Wonderful! Now the thing I need is the filter of that water purifier.

remoteCommText.cn: 资产注册表显示，这台净水设备目前的责任人是终末地的研究员罗普。
remoteCommText.en: I checked the asset register. An Endfield scientist named Ropp is in charge of the purifier unit.

remoteCommText.cn: 当时是他在负责这个项目，但之后出了点意外，资产登记上还是遗失状态……
remoteCommText.en: He was overseeing the project, but then he had an accident. The asset register indicates the item as lost...

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，能麻烦你去问问罗普有关过滤装置的情况吗？
remoteCommText.en: I'd like to get an update on the filter. Endmin, could you please visit Ropp for me?

remoteCommText.cn: 交给我们好了！
remoteCommText.en: Leave it to us!

remoteCommText.cn: 太好了，终于联系上你了，管理员。
remoteCommText.en: Thank goodness. You finally picked up the call, Endmin.

remoteCommText.cn: 嗯，我在四号谷地发现了那位红发萨卡兹少女的痕迹。
remoteCommText.en: {F}Yeah, I found trails of that red-haired Sarkaz girl in Valley IV.{M}Yeah, I found trails of that red-haired Sarkaz girl in Valley IV.

remoteCommText.cn: 我也有新发现。在罗德岛泰拉时期的数据库中，找到了一名相关干员的人事档案。
remoteCommText.en: Great. I've also uncovered something new in the Rhodes Island archives. It's an HR dossier on a particular operator from the age of Terra.

remoteCommText.cn: 萨卡兹、红发、火焰、剑，她的外貌和能力与你所描述的相符。她名叫史尔特尔。
remoteCommText.en: Red-haired Sarkaz, fire, and a sword. The appearance and abilities of this operator match your descriptions. Her name is Surtr.

remoteCommText.cn: 你所见到的，应该就是与史尔特尔有着紧密关联的再旅者，莱万汀。
remoteCommText.en: What you saw is probably Laevatain, a reconvener with close ties to Surtr.

remoteCommText.cn: 原来如此……
remoteCommText.en: {F}So that's who she is...{M}So that's who she is...

remoteCommText.cn: 根据罗德岛的记录，史尔特尔本身就患有缺失性记忆障碍，一直被多重记忆混乱所困扰，不清楚自己的真实经历。
remoteCommText.en: Records from Rhodes Island also mentioned that Surtr suffered from memory impairment. She had chronic polymnestic disorder and never knew which of her memories truly belonged to her.

remoteCommText.cn: 她第一次睁开眼睛，只看到村庄的废墟、凝固的熔岩和手中不知从何而来的剑。
remoteCommText.en: When she first opened her eyes, she only saw the ruins of a small town, solidified lava, and a sword of unknown origins in her hands.

remoteCommText.cn: 各种各样的记忆碎片淹没了她的脑海，对自己是谁，从哪里来，要到哪里去……全部无法回答。
remoteCommText.en: Her mind was filled with all sorts of fragmented memories. She could not answer who she was, where she was from, or what she wanted to do...

remoteCommText.cn: 然后她就被罗德岛带了回去。之后，史尔特尔曾多次为了寻找记忆而长时间单独行动。
remoteCommText.en: Surtr was later recruited by Rhodes Island. She spent plenty of time in solo operations in search of her memories.

remoteCommText.cn: 她找到记忆了吗？
remoteCommText.en: {F}Did she find them?{M}Did she find them?

remoteCommText.cn: 至少在罗德岛的记录里，没有。
remoteCommText.en: No, if we're just looking at the Rhodes Island archives.

remoteCommText.cn: 而莱万汀……她在塔卫二苏醒后，仍在继续寻找“真正的”记忆，像史尔特尔曾经那样。
remoteCommText.en: As for Laevatain... After her awakening on Talos-II, she continued her search for her "actual" memories. Just like Surtr had done.

remoteCommText.cn: 她与罗德岛失去联系已经有一段时间了。
remoteCommText.en: She hasn't been in contact with Rhodes Island for quite a while.

remoteCommText.cn: 那个和她相似的黑影是……？
remoteCommText.en: {F}And who is that shadow that looks like her...?{M}And who is that shadow that looks like her...?

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，以下只是我的推论……
remoteCommText.en: Endmin, I've made a few deductions of my own...

remoteCommText.cn: 莱万汀可能走向了歧途。她在协议空间里走得越深，也许不仅无法找到属于她的记忆，还会遇上一些未知的威胁。
remoteCommText.en: Laevatain may have started on the wrong trail. The further she goes into the Protocol Space, the less likely she is to find her memories. She might even encounter unknown threats.

remoteCommText.cn: 这会对她造成越来越深的伤害。
remoteCommText.en: Her injuries will only get worse with each attempt.

remoteCommText.cn: 怪不得她会有“旧伤”……
remoteCommText.en: {F}That explains her "old wounds"...{M}That explains her "old wounds"...

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，我有一个请求……希望你能帮帮她。眼下，也只有你能自由进入协议空间。
remoteCommText.en: I need to ask you for a favor, Endmin... Please, help her. You're the only one we have right now with unrestricted access into the Protocol Space.

remoteCommText.cn: 嗯，我会的。
remoteCommText.en: {F}Of course. Leave it to me.{M}Of course. Leave it to me.

remoteCommText.cn: 辛苦了，管理员，我们刚收到你发回的记录……太好了，你果然找到了莱万汀。
remoteCommText.en: Endmin, we just received the data from you... You actually found Laevatain... Good work.

remoteCommText.cn: 但她很执着……
remoteCommText.en: {F}But she's very determined...{M}But she's very determined...

remoteCommText.cn: 即便知道自己是再旅者，她也依然选择继续追寻记忆吗……
remoteCommText.en: Even though she knew she was a reconvener, she insisted on searching for those memories...

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，我能理解……要说服这样的人，并不容易。
remoteCommText.en: I understand why she's doing this, Endmin... And it won't be easy to persuade someone like her.

remoteCommText.cn: 我刚失去了她的踪迹……能帮忙找到她吗？
remoteCommText.en: {F}I just lost contact and couldn't locate her trail... Can you help me find her?{M}I just lost contact and couldn't locate her trail... Can you help me find her?

remoteCommText.cn: 这样吗……请稍等……菲奥娜刚分析了莱万汀的源石反应痕迹和协议空间的波动情况，她的踪迹……已经没入协议空间深处了。
remoteCommText.en: I see... Hold on... Fiona just analyzed traces of Laevatain's Originium reactions and Protocol Space fluctuations. Her trail ... is already deep within the Protocol Space.

remoteCommText.cn: 那……有办法进入她所在的协议空间吗？
remoteCommText.en: {F}So ... is there any way to enter that Protocol Space and find her?{M}So ... is there any way to enter that Protocol Space and find her?

remoteCommText.cn: 譬如再通过协议奇点……
remoteCommText.en: {F}Maybe we can use the Protocol Singularity again...{M}Maybe we can use the Protocol Singularity again...

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，这是个很大胆的想法……我能感受到你的焦急……
remoteCommText.en: That's quite a bold idea, Endmin... I know you're very worried and concerned...

remoteCommText.cn: 但这需要更多与莱万汀直接相关的源石反应参数……她还在什么地方活动过吗？我可以……
remoteCommText.en: But your plan needs data of Originium reactions directly associated with Laevatain... Did she visit other places? I can...

remoteCommText.cn: 我可以就近在四号谷地找一找。
remoteCommText.en: {F}I can look around in Valley IV.{M}I can look around in Valley IV.

remoteCommText.cn: 你还要亲自……那我马上连接秦工程师，让枢纽区基地协助你。
remoteCommText.en: Personally...? Alright. I'll call Director Qin right away and get her and the Hub Base to back you up.

remoteCommText.cn: 您好，管理员，您要找一位红发萨卡兹少女的踪迹？
remoteCommText.en: Greetings, Endmin. I heard you're looking for a red-haired Sarkaz girl.

remoteCommText.cn: 没错。
remoteCommText.en: {F}That's right.{M}That's right.

remoteCommText.cn: 根据佩丽卡监督传来的信息……她日常持一柄大剑，擅长使用火焰，可能会在活动过的地方留下灼痕……
remoteCommText.en: According to the data from Supervisor Perlica ... this girl usually carries a greatsword, is a skilled pyromancer, and often leaves burn marks wherever she goes...

remoteCommText.cn: 最近谷地确实报告过一些可能有关的“怪事”，我这就把目击者信息同步给您。
remoteCommText.en: We did have recent reports of "strange sightings" in the Valley. I'll sync the witnesses' data to you right away.

remoteCommText.cn: 我这就去。
remoteCommText.en: {F}I'll go talk to them now.{M}I'll go talk to them now.

remoteCommText.cn: 嗯，感谢秦工程师。管理员，你搜集到足够多的参数之后，就回帝江号吧。
remoteCommText.en: Mm. Director Qin, your work is much appreciated. Endmin, please head back to Dijiang once you've gathered enough data.

remoteCommText.cn: 我和菲奥娜会在这段时间内做好相关的准备。我在静滞核心等你。
remoteCommText.en: Fiona and I will make the preparations in the meantime. I'll be waiting at the Stasis Core.

remoteCommText.cn: 我们还没有从锚点袭击中恢复过来。
remoteCommText.en: We have yet to recover from the Ankhorfall.

remoteCommText.cn: 伤员很多，而且基地供电尚未恢复。
remoteCommText.en: Power's still out, and we've taken heavy casualties.

remoteCommText.cn: 天使破坏了许多备用线路，大量功能瘫痪。
remoteCommText.en: The Aggeloi destroyed many backup cables. Our systems are failing.

remoteCommText.cn: 来袭的裂地者确认为<@qu.key>碾骨氏族</>……
remoteCommText.en: The attacking Landbreakers have been confirmed as the <@qu.key>Bonekrushers</>.

remoteCommText.cn: 我们完全不清楚他们的目的。
remoteCommText.en: Their objective remains unclear at present.

remoteCommText.cn: 但时机如此凑巧，很难说是巧合。
remoteCommText.en: But their assault was too well-timed to be accidental.

remoteCommText.cn: 放任当前态势发展，我们将无法成功投送协议核心。
remoteCommText.en: If the current situation persists, we will not be able to successfully deploy the Automation-Core.

remoteCommText.cn: 应急预案授权我们激活协议共振塔，通过广域源石活性化来强行供电。但它的能耗实在惊人……
remoteCommText.en: We can use the Resonance Tower to activate Originium for power, but its energy cost is steep... It won't last long.

remoteCommText.cn: ……不，还有办法。只要能降下<@qu.key>协议核心</>，就有办法恢复基地的运转。
remoteCommText.en: Hmm... We have another option available. If we can deploy the <@qu.key>PAC</>, we can restore Base operations.

remoteCommText.cn: 你是说，利用协议核心给共振塔供电？
remoteCommText.en: You mean ... we power the Resonance Tower with the PAC?

remoteCommText.cn: 没错，我们可以用集成工业系统建设中继线路。
remoteCommText.en: Yes. We can use the AIC to set up a power transmission relay.

remoteCommText.cn: 只要协议共振塔启动，基地就能获得喘息的机会。
remoteCommText.en: Once the Resonance Tower is activated, the base will get some respite.

remoteCommText.cn: 沿途有许多裂地者游荡，如果能削弱他们的力量就好了……
remoteCommText.en: But there are so many Landbreakers along the way. If only we could weaken them...

remoteCommText.cn: 这有何难！
remoteCommText.en: Of course we can! Landbreakers? Pfft.

remoteCommText.cn: 等等……天使不会造成这样的破坏！难道是裂地者盯上了那里的东西？
remoteCommText.en: Wait... The Aggeloi wouldn't cause this kind of damage! Maybe the Landbreakers had their eyes on something inside!

remoteCommText.cn: 这个“副产物”都包含什么？难道也有你的“重要工作成果”？
remoteCommText.en: What's in the "byproduct" you mentioned? Another important "project" of yours?

remoteCommText.cn: 各式各样，你想得到的都有。但其中最主要的副产物是源石电池，裂地者恐怕就是冲着这个去的！
remoteCommText.en: Byproducts include all sorts of things that you can think of, but Originium batteries would be the most important. I guess the LBs are after that!

remoteCommText.cn: 先不说抢走了多少，他们肯定不懂怎么安全处理这些易燃易爆物。万一里面出了什么事，引发了源石爆炸，后果真就不堪设想了。
remoteCommText.en: Let's set aside how many these raiders stole for now. The worst part is that they know little about the safe handling of flammable and explosive materials! Things will be catastrophic if they accidentally set off an Originium explosion!

remoteCommText.cn: ……裂地者的这次袭击明显有着统一的规划。
remoteCommText.en: ...Someone must have planned and coordinated this Landbreaker attack on our Base.

remoteCommText.cn: 地下实验室、协议核心部署区，现在还有副产物中心，都不是他们平时会优先考虑的袭击目标。
remoteCommText.en: The underground lab, the Protocol Automation-Core deployment area, and now ... the byproduct processing center. Landbreakers usually wouldn't consider these as prime targets for looting and raiding.

remoteCommText.cn: 那我们还等什么？赶紧去调查一下那群面具土匪到底在想什么！
remoteCommText.en: Then what are we waiting for? Let's head over right now and check out what those pipeface bandits are after!

remoteCommText.cn: 从照片上看，副产物中心遭受的破坏非常严重，如果不能修复那里的基础设施，我们没有办法安全地开展支援工作。
remoteCommText.en: The photo tells me that the processing center has suffered severe damage. We must repair the local infrastructure first. Otherwise, we can't ensure the safety of subsequent support and repair operations.

remoteCommText.cn: 现在是集成工业系统继续发挥作用的时候啦！赶紧去<@qu.key>集成核心区域</>准备吧！
remoteCommText.en: This is where the AIC Factory comes in! Let's head on over to the <@qu.key>Core AIC Area</> right now!

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，我收到了安德烈的消息，辛苦你们了。增援小队很快会前往源石副产物中心。
remoteCommText.en: Endmin, I received Andre's message. Good job out there. A team to reinforce the Originium Byproduct Processing Center is en route.

remoteCommText.cn: 接下来，我们的目的地是<@qu.key>军械库</>。
remoteCommText.en: The <@qu.key>arsenal</> is the objective of our next mission.

remoteCommText.cn: 那位武库工程师一直联系不上，军械库入口在先前的袭击中被建筑残骸堵住了大门。
remoteCommText.en: I couldn't get in touch with our arsenal engineer. The entrance of the arsenal was blocked by a collapsed building during the attack.

remoteCommText.cn: 最近的终末地干员已经过去检查状况了，她会专门联系您。
remoteCommText.en: Our closest Endfielder is investigating the site as we speak. She should be in touch with you soon.

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，情况比想象中棘手。散落着的建筑残骸没法靠人力挪开，重型器械也暂时调不过来，现在想要打开道路，就得上爆破手段了。
remoteCommText.en: Endmin, we got a high payload situation on our hands. We don't have enough people to clean up the collapsed building and we couldn't bring in the heavy machinery. The only solution left is to up the yield and blast it all to pieces!

remoteCommText.cn: 麻烦危机处理小组过来的时候捎上足量的<@qu.key>源石粉末</>，我会在军械库入口等你们。
remoteCommText.en: I wonder if the Crisis Team could do me a favor and get me some of that <@qu.key>Originium Powder</>. I'll wait for you at the arsenal entrance.
AN-DRE!

remoteCommText.cn: 噫！？通、通讯？不对，是设置好的语音？怎么回事？
remoteCommText.en: WHA-WHAAT? Is this a radio call? No ... wait! It's a pre-recorded voice message...

remoteCommText.cn: 这是在维护模式下硬启动才会触发的语音留言！你又把我的宝贝小车怎么了！
remoteCommText.en: This voice message is triggered if some dummy performs a HARD REBOOT during maintenance mode. You! What did you do to my precious baby bot?

remoteCommText.cn: 哎呀，未卜先知嘛。
remoteCommText.en: Oooh. Someone predicted Big Owl and all his silly moves!

remoteCommText.cn: 虽然我不知道你干了什么好事，但你最好赶紧到我这儿来负荆请罪。还有，带上小车！
remoteCommText.en: I don't know what you did but it's gotta be serious. Get yourself over to my place and apologize! Also, bring my baby bot along!

remoteCommText.cn: 要是再有下一次，可别怪我不尊老爱幼了！
remoteCommText.en: Remember, if you ever do that again, there'll be NO MERCY!

remoteCommText.cn: 我们的目标是谷地要塞，这是四号谷地以前搭建的前线基地。
remoteCommText.en: Our current objective is the Valley Fort, an old forward base in Valley IV.

remoteCommText.cn: 谷地要塞有一座直通供能高地的大桥，它是枢纽区往返供能高地的主要路径。
remoteCommText.en: Valley Fort has a bridge that leads straight to the Power Plateau. It is the main road connecting the Hub to the Plateau.

remoteCommText.cn: 根据历史记录，要塞周围分布着一些居民聚落，但我现在无法进行二次确认。
remoteCommText.en: Datalogs indicate the presence of several settlements near the Fort, but I can't verify if they're still around.

remoteCommText.cn: 因为烟雾遮挡，高空视野严重受阻，只能靠你们实地查看了。
remoteCommText.en: The haze is obscuring our near orbital visual analysis. You'll have to survey the site on your own.

remoteCommText.cn: 这是我们来时的路，之前花了很大力气才从塌方中冲出来……
remoteCommText.en: This was the road we took to reach the Hub Base. We barely escaped the landslide...

remoteCommText.cn: 想快速清理掉山石需要大型机械和能源，基地里的相关设备都被破坏完了……
remoteCommText.en: We need large vehicles and lots of power to clear all this rubble away. But most machines on Base have been destroyed...

remoteCommText.cn: 真是屋漏偏逢连夜雨！
remoteCommText.en: Man, we're getting hit from all sides.

remoteCommText.cn: 我们要用最短时间组织一支清障大队。
remoteCommText.en: Stay positive, Chen. I say we assemble a landslide-clearing team. Stat!

remoteCommText.cn: 工人们的防护装备需要更新。至于清障器械，我们可以修复工团的工程车辆。
remoteCommText.en: But first, the crew needs better protective equipment. We'll also require clearing machinery. Perhaps we can repair a UWST construction vehicle for the task.

remoteCommText.cn: 安德烈先生，集成工业系统应该能帮上忙。
remoteCommText.en: Mr. Andre, I believe the AIC Factory can play a role in this endeavor.

remoteCommText.cn: 确实如此！是时候验证一下集成工业系统是否达到设计指标了，我们去集成核心区域集合吧！
remoteCommText.en: Very true! It's time to validate the design objectives of our Factory! Let's meet up at the Core AIC Area!

remoteCommText.cn: 管理……卡监督，能听到吗？
remoteCommText.en: Endmin ... visor Perlica? Do you copy?

remoteCommText.cn: 狼卫！供能高地出现了超域爆发现象，你没事吧？
remoteCommText.en: Wulfgard! We've witnessed Æther rupture taking place at the Power Plateau. Are you alright?

remoteCommText.cn: 看到火光了，已经隐蔽。
remoteCommText.en: Firelight confirmed. Cover secured.

remoteCommText.cn: 裂地者在……集合，大量……准备应对新攻势。
remoteCommText.en: Large body of LBs ... assembling at the ... Plateau. Prepare for...
I repeat...

remoteCommText.cn: 狼卫，狼卫？……通信中断了。
remoteCommText.en: Wulfgard? Wulfgard...! Signal's out.

remoteCommText.cn: 秦工程师，能听到吗？
remoteCommText.en: Director Qin, can you read me?

remoteCommText.cn: 通信没问题，佩丽卡监督，还顺利吗？
remoteCommText.en: Loud and clear, Supervisor Perlica. Everything okay on your end?

remoteCommText.cn: 公路被侵蚀冲毁了，我们需要新的路线前往供能高地。你了解源石研究园的情况吗？
remoteCommText.en: The road has been swept away by a Blightflood. We need a new path to the Power Plateau. Do you have any details on the situation in the Originium Science Park?

remoteCommText.cn: 稍等，我调取一下相关信息。
remoteCommText.en: Hold on. I'm accessing the information.

remoteCommText.cn: 公路既然被截断，最便捷的路线就废掉了。
remoteCommText.en: If the road is out, then the quickest way to the Power Plant is no longer available.

remoteCommText.cn: 新路线从这里开始。
remoteCommText.en: Your new path starts at this point.

remoteCommText.cn: 转运枢纽、源石实验园区，然后是研究所，新路线需要穿过所有地点。
remoteCommText.en: You'll move through the Transport Nexus, then the Originium Science Park, and finally arrive at the Research Center.

remoteCommText.cn: 附近有过裂地者目击报告，要做好在实验园区内遇敌的准备。
remoteCommText.en: But be cautious — we've received confirmed witness reports of Landbreakers in the area. Stay on high alert inside the Science Park.

remoteCommText.cn: 穿过整个实验园区之后，再从研究所后方的山路前往矿脉源区的运输区。
remoteCommText.en: Once you reach the Research Center, head to the back and take the mountain trail. It leads straight to the Logistics Area at the Origin Lodespring.

remoteCommText.cn: 佩丽卡监督，还有一件事。有一位重要的研究者还在研究所里，但现在处于失联状态。
remoteCommText.en: And just a heads-up, Supervisor Perlica — there's a vital Ætherside scientist still in the Research Center, but we've lost communication.

remoteCommText.cn: 伊冯……
remoteCommText.en: Yvonne...

remoteCommText.cn: 我们会想办法进行联络。放心，以伊冯的本事，应该不会出大问题。
remoteCommText.en: We'll try to get in touch with our scientist. Don't worry. Given Yvonne's skills, I'm sure things will be all right.

remoteCommText.cn: 侵蚀爆发之后，一切都是不可控的，我们需要超域领域的专家提供帮助。
remoteCommText.en: You're right. Everything is getting out of control after the Blight eruption. We really need the help of every expert on the Ætherside.

remoteCommText.cn: 我们明白。安德烈先生在中控塔吗？
remoteCommText.en: Agreed. By the way, is Mr. Andre still at the Control Tower?

remoteCommText.cn: 我在，我在！怎么了，佩丽卡监督？
remoteCommText.en: YEAH! I'm right here! What do you need, Supervisor Perlica?

remoteCommText.cn: 我们用你说的方法解决了侵蚀核心。但原型机的发热情况变得很不正常，似乎过载了。
remoteCommText.en: We've followed the method you told us and got rid of a Blight Core. However, the Prototype is now overheating abnormally. We might have overloaded its systems.

remoteCommText.cn: 过载？不应该啊……等等，可能是广域施术单元没有完全适配针对侵蚀的参数。
remoteCommText.en: Overloaded? That shouldn't be happening... Wait. Perhaps the large area Arts Unit is not fully adapted to the Blight-specific parameters.

remoteCommText.cn: 裂隙出现后深度发生了变化，严重超出了实验模拟的数值……对了！你们不是要去找伊冯吗？那就有办法！
remoteCommText.en: Depth readings must have changed drastically after the rift appeared. The figures seem way, way beyond our theoretical simulations... Oh! You're going to look for Yvonne, right? Yvonne might know what to do!

remoteCommText.cn: 不过，在伊冯检查之前，可得控制一下原型机的使用频率，避免出现不可逆的损伤。
remoteCommText.en: But, um ... could you maybe ... hold back on using the Prototype? At least until it's been inspected and repaired? We don't want any permanent damage to happen.

remoteCommText.cn: 好，我们会留意的。
remoteCommText.en: Understood. We'll try to avoid that.

remoteCommText.cn: 佩丽卡，是你吧？你是不是和我的原型机在一起？
remoteCommText.en: Perlica, is it you? Are you accompanying my Prototype?

remoteCommText.cn: 它的信号怎么会在园区里？
remoteCommText.en: Why is its signal in the Park?

remoteCommText.cn: 我试着联系它，但系统一直在报错。
remoteCommText.en: I tried contacting it but keep getting error messages.

remoteCommText.cn: 你就是伊冯吗？快，塔塔有些不对劲……
remoteCommText.en: Are you Yvonne? Help us! Tata isn't looking good at all...

remoteCommText.cn: 什么塔塔？快告诉我原型机的情况！
remoteCommText.en: What on Talos is a Tata? Tell me about the Prototype!

remoteCommText.cn: 它的温度在升高……各个模块的参数也都开始不稳定了。
remoteCommText.en: It's getting hotter... And the readings of various modules are getting increasingly unstable.

remoteCommText.cn: 安德烈先生给它加装了一个广域施术单元。我们把原型机连上了信号塔，尝试一次性扫描大范围的侵蚀。
remoteCommText.en: Mr. Andre furnished it with a large area Arts Unit. We linked the Prototype to a signal tower, and then attempted a single Blight scan for the entire place.
YOU WHAT?!

remoteCommText.cn: 那个模块就是我做的！前端还没调试稳定，还不能那么做，快把日志发给我！
remoteCommText.en: I was the one who made that module, and the frontend isn't even calibrated for stability! Scanning with it is a terrible, terrible idea. Send me the usage logs!

remoteCommText.cn: 啊！我知道了！那个老黎博利……
remoteCommText.en: Ahhhh! I knew it! It must be that big old Liberi...

remoteCommText.cn: 天哪！他给广域施术单元写了个简化版的调用指令，大量未经验证的数据都被非法拉取了，当然会出问题……该死！
remoteCommText.en: Oh by Talos! He wrote an overly simplistic access command for the large area Arts Unit! It acquired way too much unverified data without authorization. No wonder we're getting this problem... Blasted blightery!

remoteCommText.cn: 我们正在走的山路通往工团的矿脉源区。
remoteCommText.en: We're taking this mountain trail and it leads to the Origin Lodespring of the UWST.

remoteCommText.cn: 它和阿伯莉采石场一样，也曾是四号谷地振兴的起点。但在二十年前的危机后，这里被废弃了。
remoteCommText.en: Like the Aburrey Quarry, the Lodespring was once a cornerstone that made Valley IV a success. But the place was largely abandoned after the crisis that took place twenty years ago.

remoteCommText.cn: 南部是<@qu.key>矿区营地</>，许多工人家属都住在这里。
remoteCommText.en: There's a <@qu.key>Mining Camp</> to the south. Family members of the UWST crew live here.

remoteCommText.cn: 岔路两侧分别是旧矿区和运输区。过去，四号谷地的源石矿几乎都产自这片矿区，实验园区所使用的原料也都源自矿区的副产物。
remoteCommText.en: The fork here leads to the Old Mines and the Logistics Area respectively. In the past, almost all of the Originium used by Valley IV was supplied by these mines. Local mining byproducts were also used as raw materials by the Science Park.

remoteCommText.cn: 而运输区曾经是矿物的主要运输路径，早期的货运公路也修建在这里。那时，它们承载着贯通谷地多个开拓区的任务。
remoteCommText.en: The Logistics Area used to be the main mineral ore transport route. The early freight road was built here as well. Together, they established connections to multiple frontier regions of the Valley.

remoteCommText.cn: 在二者之间，是工团划定的名为“世代摇篮”的隔离区，那里还残留着灾难留下的创伤。
remoteCommText.en: Between these two areas, the UWST marked out a containment zone that they called the Cradle of the Ages. The place still bears the scars of a past disaster.

remoteCommText.cn: 只要通过那一带，应该就离供能高地不远了。
remoteCommText.en: Once we get through this area, the Power Plateau shouldn't be far.

remoteCommText.cn: 声音很清晰，洛茜，你发现了什么吗？
remoteCommText.en: Loud and clear, Rossi. What have you found?

remoteCommText.cn: 探查队回来了，带回了一些很特别的东西……我觉得很可能会对你们有帮助。
remoteCommText.en: The survey team has returned with ... something special... Something that I think might help you out.

remoteCommText.cn: 但是……整个探查队只回来了一个人……他想见见你们。
remoteCommText.en: But ... only one crew mate of the survey team made it back... He wants to see you in person.

remoteCommText.cn: 没问题，菲奥娜已经把定位发给我了，我们马上赶过去。
remoteCommText.en: No problem. Fiona has shared the coordinates with me. We'll be right over.

remoteCommText.cn: 啧，还得是笨办法有用。喂，能听到吗？
remoteCommText.en: Hmph! Good old percussive maintenance never fails. Hello? Do you copy?

remoteCommText.cn: 你们是终末地的人吧？赶快离开这里，能躲多远躲多远！这不是提醒，是警告，再晚可就没机会了。
remoteCommText.en: Are you Endfielders? Get out of this place! Get as far as you can! This is a warning, not a reminder! Do as I say before it's too late.

remoteCommText.cn: 我是终末地的监督佩丽卡，你用的不是工团的认证身份，请问你是？
remoteCommText.en: I am Supervisor Perlica of Endfield Industries. You are not using a verified UWST ID. Please identify yourself.

remoteCommText.cn: 佩丽卡……等等，你说你是佩丽卡？
remoteCommText.en: Perlica...? Wait, did you say you are Perlica?

remoteCommText.cn: ……管理员在你身边吗？
remoteCommText.en: ...Is the Endministrator with you?

remoteCommText.cn: 在继续沟通前，我们需要知道你的身份。
remoteCommText.en: Before we continue this call, you must identify yourself.

remoteCommText.cn: 麦斯·克劳，我是这座源石发电站的负责人，你们能查到我的身份信息。
remoteCommText.en: Matz Crowe. I'm in charge of this Originium Power Plant. You should be able to find details about my ID.

remoteCommText.cn: 动作快！现在情况紧急，这里的通信被切断了，这临时通信器还不知道能撑多久。
remoteCommText.en: And make it quick! Situation is urgent. They've cut our comm lines. I don't know how long this temporary comm device is going to last.

remoteCommText.cn: ……身份核对无误。克劳先生，管理员正和我们一起行动，你联络我们的目的是？
remoteCommText.en: ...We've verified your ID, Mr. Crowe. Yes, the Endministrator is with us. What is the purpose of your call?

remoteCommText.cn: 远程通信很难说清楚，这里已经快……完蛋了，必须……我发给你们我……的坐标，我们当……面说。
remoteCommText.en: It's hard to describe this over the radio. This place is ... screwed and I must ... I'm sending you ... coordinates. We'll talk ... face-to-face.

remoteCommText.cn: 喂？等等……
remoteCommText.en: Hold on! Wait...!

remoteCommText.cn: 这是依据工团开发计划书搭建的地图。
remoteCommText.en: This map is constructed using UWST blueprints.

remoteCommText.cn: 我们位于工团的源石发电站中，工团的大部分老式设备都存放在这里。
remoteCommText.en: We're in the Originium Power Plant. Most of the old machinery is stored here.

remoteCommText.cn: 这里是超域试验场，四号谷地当前灾害的源头，我们的最终目标。
remoteCommText.en: This is the Æther Test Site, source of the current disaster in Valley IV and our final objective.

remoteCommText.cn: 聂菲斯的部下很可能遍布在这两座建筑物内，我们沿途会遭遇碾骨氏族主力的疯狂抵抗。
remoteCommText.en: Nefarith's lackeys might have overrun these two areas. We'll be facing the main Bonekrusher force along the way.

remoteCommText.cn: 看来我们只能穿过这里了，走吧。
remoteCommText.en: Cutting through this place seems like our only option. Let's go.

remoteCommText.cn: 武陵甚大裂隙是目前文明环带内已知的最大裂隙。
remoteCommText.en: Wuling Very Large Rift is the largest known rift in the Civilization Band.

remoteCommText.cn: 而武陵城就位于这道裂隙的正上方，主要负责监控裂隙的异常活动。
remoteCommText.en: Wuling City is right above this rift. Its main task is to monitor the rift for abnormal activities.

remoteCommText.cn: 尽管武陵城毗邻周期性的侵蚀潮，但在他们每年的民生简报上，各项指标都表现优异。
remoteCommText.en: Though Wuling and its outskirts are regularly subject to Blight Tides, they achieved great results across every metric in their annual household data reports.

remoteCommText.cn: 这都要归功于武陵的重点科研项目——“息壤计划”。
remoteCommText.en: This is made possible with Wuling's key scientific endeavor — Project Xiranite.

remoteCommText.cn: 既然这样，怎么没有在整个环带将息壤大加推广，来控制侵蚀灾害？
remoteCommText.en: Then why didn't they promote Xiranite in the Band? That would really help us control the Blight.

remoteCommText.cn: ……这原本就是我们期望就集成工业系统，与宏科院正式合作的计划内容之一。
remoteCommText.en: ...Yes. This is one of the motivations behind our joint AIC Factory undertaking with HAS.

remoteCommText.cn: 希望这一次我们的合作能重回正轨。管理员，准备好后我们就出发。
remoteCommText.en: Hopefully, this operation brings our partnership back on track. Endmin, we'll set off once you're ready.

remoteCommText.cn: 阿庄，怎么了？
remoteCommText.en: What is it, Fangyi?

remoteCommText.cn: 抱歉各位，事态紧急，天有洪炉的落成还顺利吗？
remoteCommText.en: Apologies, but we have an emergency. Has the Forge of the Sky been deployed?

remoteCommText.cn: 十分顺利，我们刚刚完成第一批息壤的特性验证。有什么需要帮忙的吗？
remoteCommText.en: It's done. We also verified the first batch of Xiranite produced. Is there anything else we can do?

remoteCommText.cn: 就在刚才，<@qu.key>观测站</>的数据回传完全中断了。
remoteCommText.en: We just completely lost the data link to the <@qu.key>monitoring center</>.

remoteCommText.cn: 那里常年监测着周边环境的深度读数，是抵抗侵蚀潮的第一线。
remoteCommText.en: The center constantly monitors ambient Depth readings. It's our first line of Blight Tide defense.

remoteCommText.cn: 如果它被侵蚀彻底覆盖，我们会失去监测侵蚀活动的重要渠道，城市预警也会受到影响。
remoteCommText.en: It plays a key role in monitoring Blight activity. If we lose the monitoring center, the city's early warning system will be compromised.

remoteCommText.cn: 天使和敌人不足挂齿，但如果出现大规模侵蚀……
remoteCommText.en: Aggeloi and other enemies can be dealt with. But a large scale Blight event...

remoteCommText.cn: 正好直接进行息壤的实战检测。
remoteCommText.en: It'll serve as a field test for our Xiranite.

remoteCommText.cn: 会影响刚刚投入使用的生产线吗？
remoteCommText.en: Won't this affect our new production line?

remoteCommText.cn: 不用担心。
remoteCommText.en: It'll be alright.

remoteCommText.cn: 那么，我相信终末地。弭弗会前去与各位会合。
remoteCommText.en: Well, I have faith in Endfield. Mi Fu will be joining you.

remoteCommText.cn: 彦宁，帮终末地收集天有洪炉的运行数据。
remoteCommText.en: Yan Ning, help Endfield gather performance data of the Forge.

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，观测站就拜托你们重启了。
remoteCommText.en: Endmin, we're counting on you to restart the monitoring center.

remoteCommText.cn: 喂，喂喂——黑面煞！
remoteCommText.en: Hello? Hello hello hello—? DARKMASK!

remoteCommText.cn: 汤汤？
remoteCommText.en: Tangtang?

remoteCommText.cn: 和我哥谈妥了！寨子里的地都准备好了！
remoteCommText.en: I got my Big Bro to agree! We've prepped a pretty plot of land at the Stockade!

remoteCommText.cn: 对了，之前连通我们和武陵城的那条<@qu.key>断路</>已经被天师修好了。
remoteCommText.en: Before I forget, the Tianshi fixed that <@qu.key>broken road</> between our Stockade and Wuling City.

remoteCommText.cn: 这次咱就正大光明地请你们回寨子，看弭弗敢不敢说什么！
remoteCommText.en: And we're giving you a SUPER OFFICIAL INVITE! I super dare Mi Fu to say no to that!

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，佩丽卡监督！我是法比安·柯林斯，你们能听到吗？
remoteCommText.en: Endministrator! Supervisor Perlica! Fabian Collins here. Do you copy?

remoteCommText.cn: 可以听到，看来实验园区内部的通信已经完全恢复了。
remoteCommText.en: Loud and clear. Radio seems to be completely back online for the Science Park.

remoteCommText.cn: 太好了，你们一路上还顺利吗？
remoteCommText.en: Great. How are you doing in your mission?

remoteCommText.cn: 我们已经见到了伊冯，她目前很安全。现在我们正朝矿脉源区前进。
remoteCommText.en: We've met Yvonne and she is currently safe. We are now heading towards the Origin Lodespring.

remoteCommText.cn: 对了，地下那批人，情况怎么样了？
remoteCommText.en: How about you? What happened to the crew mates in the underground area?

remoteCommText.cn: 他们应该已经抵达枢纽区基地了。
remoteCommText.en: They should have arrived at the Hub Base already.

remoteCommText.cn: 多亏了你们清理了大部分裂地者，不然绝不会这么顺利。
remoteCommText.en: And thank you for taking out most of the Landbreakers. Things wouldn't have gone this smoothly otherwise.

remoteCommText.cn: 四号谷地应急委员会已经成立，基建前站正式成为了四号谷地的一个临时避难点。其他区域的避难人员也在往那边聚集。
remoteCommText.en: We have established a Valley IV Emergency Committee. The Infra-Station is now a formal refuge point in the Valley. Refugees and disaster victims from other areas are moving there as we speak.

remoteCommText.cn: 园区过去避难的人已经跟我们联系上了，我们正准备过去核对名单。
remoteCommText.en: The refugees heading from the Park have contacted us. We're heading over to verify the name list.

remoteCommText.cn: 太好了！这么说，园区里的人都已经确认安全了？
remoteCommText.en: Wonderful! That means everyone from the Park is accounted for and safe, right?

remoteCommText.cn: 还没有，情况太混乱了。不止园区里，各地上报的失踪人员也越来越多了，我们……
remoteCommText.en: Not yet. It's a mess there right now. Not just the Park, either. We have a growing list of missing people from various areas. We're...

remoteCommText.cn: 继续找就是了。
remoteCommText.en: We'll just keep looking for them.

remoteCommText.cn: 嗯！
remoteCommText.en: Yeah!

remoteCommText.cn: 如果各位有空的话，也可以去基建前站看看。那里……需要帮助。
remoteCommText.en: If you have the time, you might want to check things out at the Infra-Station. That place ... really needs some help.

remoteCommText.cn: 情况我们已经掌握。四号谷地遭此重创，救灾与避难是第一位的，终末地工业会全力配合避难点的建设。
remoteCommText.en: We have an understanding of the situation. Valley IV has been grievously hit. Disaster relief and evacuating the victims shall be our primary concerns. Endfield Industries will fully commit to the construction of various refuge points.

remoteCommText.cn: 非常感谢！我这就通知诺夫曼，他是基建前站的临时负责人。
remoteCommText.en: Thank you so much! I'll notify Noffman right away. He's the provisional monitor of the Infra-Station.

remoteCommText.cn: 情况我都了解了……管理员，这件事就如柯林斯先生判断的那样，稍微有些麻烦。
remoteCommText.en: Thank you, Endmin... I now have a general understanding of the situation. And Mr. Collins is right. This is a complicated situation.

remoteCommText.cn: 交给我们处理确实是个正确的选择。
remoteCommText.en: He's right to ask us to help with this incident.

remoteCommText.cn: 不过，若是那位记者女士真的那么难缠，我想你也需要一名合适的协助者。
remoteCommText.en: But if that journalist is as annoying as he claims, we'll need to give you a suitable assistant.

remoteCommText.cn: 等我联系上她，就让她直接去找你会合。
remoteCommText.en: I'll give her a call and tell her to rendezvous with you directly.

remoteCommText.cn: 管理员，抱歉，我暂时可能没办法和你们会合……临时出现了一点意外状况，我得去处理下。
remoteCommText.en: Endministrator? Sorry, but I'm afraid I won't be able to meet you on time... Something unexpected came up and I really need to go and handle it.

remoteCommText.cn: 不过请放心，我们的人已经守在了难民暂居处所有的出入口，不会再让那个记者溜走了。
remoteCommText.en: But don't worry. I've got my crew stationed at every entrance and exit of the camp. That Bander paparazza won't be going anywhere!

remoteCommText.cn: 对了，我还是先把工友们对她的描述发给您吧！
remoteCommText.en: Before I forget, my crew also gave me a few pointers on what that little sneak looks like. I'm sending them to you!

remoteCommText.cn: 您过去之后，可以参考这些信息多判断判断。
remoteCommText.en: Once you reach the camp, reference these pointers to find our unwanted VIP.

remoteCommText.cn: 喂，你好，请问是——
remoteCommText.en: Hello there. Avy here. Who's this?

remoteCommText.cn: 救、救命……救救我！！！
remoteCommText.en: HELP! HELP...!! PLEASE HELLLPPPP!!

remoteCommText.cn: 等等，你是……琼斯女士？
remoteCommText.en: Hold on. Is this ... Miss Jones?

remoteCommText.cn: 是我……对不起，真的对不起！我不该乱跑的……这地方……这地方也太大了……
remoteCommText.en: Yeah ... it's me! I'm sorry, I really mean it! This place is way bigger than I thought... I shouldn't be running all over the place...

remoteCommText.cn: 你这是迷路了？
remoteCommText.en: Let me guess. Are you ... lost?

remoteCommText.cn: 对……我也不知道这是哪儿……附近……附近都长得差不多……你们快来救救我吧！呜……救救我……拜托了……
remoteCommText.en: Yeah... I've got no idea where I am right now... Everything looks the same in this place... Just come and save me! Please! I really need help... I don't want to die here...

remoteCommText.cn: 现在你总算明白了吧？之前管理员劝你的话，真的不是什么“危言耸听”哦。
remoteCommText.en: Oh dear, that sounds terrible! I hope you've learned your lesson. Our Endmin was being really nice and honest last time. Nobody was trying to scare you.

remoteCommText.cn: 我知道了……知道了……你们说得都对……是我太想当然了……只要你们肯来救我……我保证不乱跑了！
remoteCommText.en: I know... I should've listened... I was too confident... Please ... just come and save me... I swear I won't go running off on my own again! I PROMISE!

remoteCommText.cn: 琼斯女士，你先别慌——刚刚你是不是说“附近都长得差不多”？
remoteCommText.en: Easy there, Miss Jones, try to calm down and take a deep breath. You just said everything looks the same at your current location, right?

remoteCommText.cn: 那你干脆用终端拍张附近的照片，然后发过来，方便我们确认你的位置。
remoteCommText.en: Take a photo with your handyterm and send it to us. We'll use that photo to find where you are.

remoteCommText.cn: 我就在这里！
remoteCommText.en: I'm right here!

remoteCommText.cn: ……呼，收到了。管理员，这张照片我也发你一份吧。
remoteCommText.en: Phewie... Got it. Endmin, I'm sending you the photo as well.

remoteCommText.cn: 琼斯女士，我们这就来找你。
remoteCommText.en: Alright, Miss Jones, we're coming to pick you up.

remoteCommText.cn: 谢谢！！！太感谢了！
remoteCommText.en: THANK YOU! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!

remoteCommText.cn: 不过在我们来之前，你最好找个安全的地方躲一下哦。
remoteCommText.en: Ahem. Don't get too excited. I need you to look for a safe place to hide and stay out of sight.

remoteCommText.cn: 好，我明白！我这就去找！
remoteCommText.en: OK! Got it! Gonna hide myself in a safe place!

remoteCommText.cn: 然后千万不要大声喊叫，不要随便碰附近的生物，也不要去看起来太暗的地方……
remoteCommText.en: And please, for goodness sake, don't be so loud. Stay away from the local wildlife, and avoid dark places...

remoteCommText.cn: 没问题……没问题……
remoteCommText.en: Got it...! I'll be very quiet...
